title: Alternate BJP Leadership In Karnataka Exists, Says BS Yediyurappa - NDTV
description: Amid speculations about a leadership change in Karnataka, Chief Minister BS Yediyurappa on Sunday said he will continue in the top post as long as the BJP high command has confidence in him and he had no confusion about it.

title: Delhi govt hospital order asking nurses not to converse in Malayalam withdrawn - The Indian Express
description: Delhi news: A circular asking nursing staff at Govind Ballabh Pant Institute of Post Graduate Medical Education and Research not to converse in Malayalam has been withdrawn, said the institute's Medical Director Dr Anil Agarwal.

title: Covid Crisis: Safeguarding children from future waves with vaccination - Sify
description: New Delhi, June 6 (IANSlife) India and several other countries have been undergoing the deadly second wave of Covid-19 and fear looms large that future waves might predominately infect children.
